messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: natural learning/UU
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8-15-2003 6:56:26 AM Mountain Daylight Time, ... I just did a talk at our fellowship comparing unschooling to UU, I called it unchurching
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8-15-2003 6:56:26 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
KathrynJB@... writes:

> we're Unitarian Universalists, so the goal is to get the kid to figure
> out his own spiritual path

I just did a talk at our fellowship comparing unschooling to UU, I called it
unchurching :-D

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...

They expand our imaginations to infinite possibilities that cannot exist in a
life of isolation." --Brian Koslow
